name: Dandex Cooling Itch Control Shampoo
description: Dandex Pro Scalp is a pioneering expert in anti-dandruff shampoos in the Sri Lankan market. The Cooling & Itch Control Shampoo with Active Climbazole effectively fights against dandruff with Cool Mint that cools and refreshes the scalp. Soothes itching and irritations. Its 2 in 1 formula with Shampoo   Conditioner gives you supple & smooth hair after every wash. The shampoo should be applied onto wet hair, massaged into the scalp and thoroughly rinsed off. Best results can be achieved through regular use. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
